articles.author: Daisy Ruth
articles.title: WWE Hall Of Famer Eric Bischoff Doesn't Mince Words On Vince McMahon Lawsuit - Wrestling Inc.
articles.description: Eric Bischoff has discussed the recent allegations against Vince McMahon, while also praying that everyone affected by the allegations finds peace.
articles.content: Eric Bischoff said there are so many innocent people affected by the lawsuit, including close friends and family members of the victim, as well as Vince McMahon's family, including his son Shane, dau… [+1351 chars]
